title: Chic Modern Studio Surrounded by Seaside Serenity in Port District
description: This bright and stylish studio, offering 1 bedroom and 1 sleek ensuite bathroom, blends modern comfort with Baltic vibes. Measuring a generous 34 sqm, the open living area enjoys minimalist aesthetics paired with a cutting-edge façade, maximizing natural light. An exclusive EV charging station on-site underlines the property’s commitment to eco-friendly modernity. Thoughtfully designed for work and unwind, you’ll find every convenience right at your fingertips.
neighborhood_description: Set in Ustka’s laid-back Port District, this address enjoys a uniquely peaceful setting beside the harbor, famous for its quiet ambiance and local seaside appeal. Wide bike lanes meander through residential streets, and highway access puts city breaks or business travel within easy reach, even as you savor the district’s relaxed lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: access to Baltic relaxation and beaches
target_buyer: Perfect for young professionals or luxury-minded singles seeking a secure, serene base for digital work and easy recreational commutes, as well as seaside downtime after city projects.
market_positioning: This property melds coastal calm and contemporary amenities rare in the affordable studio market, providing an exclusive niche for discerning buyers prioritizing both lifestyle and eco-friendly practicality.
